main event: A witness observed a UFO estimated to be the size of a large tire hovering 60 to 80 feet above the ground near St. George, Utah, for 1 hour and 37 minutes.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 4 to 5 minutes during the sighting., The object was described as having a constant bright white light., The witness, a doctor and pilot, was considered reliable and was accompanied by 10 other witnesses., Excellent weather conditions were reported at the time of the sighting., The object crossed the sky from east to west at a very high altitude, estimated between 50,000 to 80,000 feet.
witness description: The main witness was a doctor and pilot from St. George, Utah.
